attributes.action: Aloow medical help for babies born under the abortion limit
attributes.additional_details:
Currently, if a baby is born before 22 weeks the national guidelines are not to give medical treatment. This is heartbreaking for the parents who have to watch their child die with nobody helping.

I am not asking for changes to the abortion limit, but to allow babies who were not chosen for abortion to have the right to medical procedures so that they can live.
